abstract: Abbott Laboratories will pay $3.72 billion to acquire India’s Piramal Healthcare’s pharmaceutical solutions business, as global drugmakers look to boost their presence in emerging markets, Reuters reported.
snippet: Abbott Laboratories will pay $3.72 billion to acquire India’s Piramal Healthcare’s pharmaceutical solutions business, as global drugmakers look to boost their presence in emerging markets, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Abbott Laboratories will pay $3.72 billion to acquire India’s Piramal Healthcare‘s pharmaceutical solutions business, as global drugmakers look to boost their presence in emerging markets, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Abbott in $3.7 Billion Deal for Piramal Unit in India
